name: Word Search Mania
description:
Word Search Mania is a casual game for those that like word or puzzle games.

This is a word search game where each game is unique with a randomly generated and constantly changing board. It's a race against time to find as many words as possible and words are searchable in any direction. Finding words eliminates the letters used, and new letters are added to top up the board.

The Google Play version includes more modes and difficulty levels.
